scripts.agent-run: [ -z "$INSTANA_AGENT_KEY" ] || [ -z "$INSTANA_AGENT_ENDPOINT" ] || [ -z "$INSTANA_AGENT_ENDPOINT_PORT" ] && { echo 'Error: Missing required environment variables'; exit 1; } || docker rm -f instana-agent || true && docker run -d --privileged --pid=host --network=instana-net --restart=always -e INSTANA_AGENT_ENDPOINT_PORT=$INSTANA_AGENT_ENDPOINT_PORT -e INSTANA_AGENT_KEY=$INSTANA_AGENT_KEY -e INSTANA_AGENT_ENDPOINT=$INSTANA_AGENT_ENDPOINT -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v /:/rootfs:ro -v /sys:/sys:ro --name instana-agent containers.instana.io/instana/release/agent/dynamic:latest
scripts.app-run: docker rm -f docker-collector-v2-app || true && docker run --network=instana-net -p 3022:3022 --name docker-collector-v2-app docker-collector-v2
